formatMoreInfo1: Each glyph will be defined by poligons with a fixed number of control points or segments.
formatMoreInfo2: More poligons/segments means more fidelity at the cost of slower computations.
modelsUnavailable: At the moment is not possible to retrieve available models. Please, try later.
noModelSelected: Select a model from the list first.
errorOcurred: An error as occurred. Please, try later.
noInputs: At least a glyph needs to be provided in order to generate a new font.
helpStep1: Design some cool Roman uppercase letters.
helpStep1Part2: Keep in mind each available model performs better when some specific letters are provided.
helpStep2: Save them individually on PNG format, same dimensions (pref. 64x64) and grayscale
helpStep3: Upload them to the canvas on the right.
helpStep4: Label each glyph using the right bottom text box that appears in each card.
helpStep5: Adjust the settings bellow to your liking.
